Silas della Colombo: Your <q>Little Flower</q> was holding you back. She made you weak. She had to be <q>dealt with.</q>

Ori del Corvo: Ori's arms transform into horrible, ripsaw-like appendages, tearing into Silas' body. You will not speak of Rose again.

Silas della Colombo: Silas coughs up pitch-black blood. No matter what Ori does to this body, it will not be permanent. None the less, Ori is content with simply causing pain. That make you feel better, brother? You know, Father misses having you around. I, on the other hand, quite enjoy not being second-best for once.

Ori del Corvo: Father is dead. You kneel to a Throne of Rust.
